name: DJ Nova
bio: High-energy DJ spinning club anthems and EDM hits. Known for electrifying live sets.

name: Sonal Singh
bio: Versatile dancer trained in classical, Bollywood, and hip-hop. Regular performer at cultural fests.

name: Neha Sharma
bio: Award-winning vocalist with expertise in Indian classical and Bollywood genres.

name: MC Raghav
bio: Motivational speaker and host for corporate events and college fests. Engaging and dynamic.

name: DJ Electra
bio: Female DJ known for upbeat Bollywood remixes and corporate party vibes.

name: Aakash Mehta
bio: Stand-up comedian and public speaker with great storytelling abilities.

name: Shruti Dance Crew
bio: Professional dance troupe performing in weddings and TV reality shows.

name: Rahul Dev
bio: Playback singer and live performer with a voice that stirs emotions.
